id: Sandra Bullock donates $100,000 to help save animals from California fires
paragraph: By Sandra Gonzalez, CNNUpdated 7:00 AM ET, Tue November 13, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.
